title: Running Over (Demo)
lyrics:
[Verse 1: Justin Bieber]
From the beginning it was ending
We were emotionally pending
Jeopardy, second guessing
Got all the questions to my answers
[Chorus: Justin Bieber & 
Ski Mask the Slump God
]
Keep runnin' over me with your lovin'
I'm only right here for your consumption
Keep runnin' over me with your lovin'
Lookin' like it's turnin' into something (
Yup, yup, yup, yup
)
[Verse 2: Ski Mask the Slump God & 
Justin Bieber
]
Huh, well okay
Told her that it's going down like that lace 
(Wee-ooh, wee-ooh, ooh)
Before I eat her for dinner, I say grace
Kickin' it with her, I resemble a sensei
Mistakes that I've made
Made my bed, I lay my head in it (
Wee-ooh, wee-ooh, ooh
)
So save your breath, no need to explainin' it
Because I need that
Old love, like the Adam and Eve
Like something before BC
Baby, we should have a toast to us
Yes, the both of us, because our love is the bees knees
Without you, it's insanity, would scream profanity
But Justin told me, "Keep it PG"
I see you, me on my BB
Simons belt shinin' on 'em down to Waikiki (Okay)
Tuesday, huh, it feel like Friday when you met me, huh
We was bumping Kodak on the interstate, huh
You can tell me and her have exquisite taste, huh
That's my little baby

[Chorus: Justin Bieber]
Keep runnin' over me with your lovin'
I'm only right here for your consumption
Keep runnin' over me with your lovin'
Lookin' like it's turnin' into something
[Outro: Justin Bieber]
Wee-ooh, wee-ooh, ooh
Wee-ooh, wee-ooh, ooh
